description: NEW YORK (AP) — The 173 players eligible for salary arbitration. For those not reaching agreements, proposed salaries will be exchanged Jan. 8:AMERICAN LEAGUEATHLETICS (1) — Shea Langeliers, c.BALTIMORE (10) — Keegan Akin, lhp; Kyle Bradish, rhp; Yennier Cano, rhp; Gunnar Henderson, ss; Dean Kremer, rhp; Ryan Mountcastle, 1b; Trevor Rogers, lhp; Adley Rutschman, c; Taylor Ward, of; Tyler Wells, rhp.BOSTON (4) — Triston Casas, 1b; Kutter Crawford, rhp; Romy González, 2b; Tanner Houck, rhp.
